name: Simple Paintball Game
description:
This is the first game project by the Macquarie University chapter of the International Game Developers Association.

https://www.facebook.com/groups/IGDAMQ/

It's a network multiplayer 3rd person shooter with paintballs! The overall idea was to create a game we'd play in the computer labs without getting into too much trouble. "Hey, it's a game we're making - it's actual school work! (sort of)"

The varied levels are deliberately untextured to accentuate the colourful effect of the paintballs. It's a little quirky (buggy) in some parts, but hey, it works! Check it out.
